article_title: Strange bedfellows: Texas Democrat, Republican oppose trade plan
article_text: Trade promotion authority had a rocky path in the House this week as illustrated by a liberal Democrat and conservative Republican from North Texas both voting against it.

article_metadata.news-keywords: Rep. Marc Veasey, Rep. Michael Burgess, North Texas, trade, fast-track, trade adjustment assistance
